title: China’s CO2 Emissions Might Have Finally Peaked
description: China has rapidly become the world leader in renewable energy, but continued coal use means it could take longer for its emissions to decline
content:
China’s carbon dioxide emissions have plateaued in 2025, indicating the country may have reached a peak after years of being the world’s top emitter.
The plateau reflects how China’s record-setting … [+1475 chars]
